title: Ticket #6314: Expose the secure file transport mechanism for prestaging.
description: It should not be difficult to add more files to the existing config tarball, or modify the script to download a second tarball and extract the file(s) to a known location (not /etc/condor). This would allow users to prestage data, e.g., when creating an annex dedicated to running a single workflow with common input data.
creator: tlmiller
